additionalInfo: all prices include full day service of 8 hours maximum.
all Packages include 200 photos digital, 1 video with maximum duration of 5 min, 2 photo albums 40 x 60cm hard cover, 1 USB Stick containing all 200 photos and 1 video
book a date = down payment 30% of total price (non refundable in case of a cancelation)
extra services such as more photos and or videos, extra hour (for event > 8 hours) can be booked by contacting our hotline
full payment has to be completed 7 days before event at the latest
for more details about terms and conditions, don't hesitate to contact our team
